name: Usual Delivery.
description:
Open-world game prototype set on a sea.

forkloo presents a game made between sucking my energy up by college assignments, continuous self dissociation, overdosing caffeine every single day and eating 1 meter long kebab.

Traverse the endless sea with only 3 islands, fight game breaking bugs that will freeze your character forever, don't talk to the dude that steals your items every time you talk to him.

I created more features that I needed and I ended up creating some simple delivery task that doesn't even work.😊😊😊😊😊

Very rushed. Very buggy. Lots of typos. May even crash!

I wanna update this one so stay tuned.

i need to take a break

Controls:

WSAD - move around

Mouse - look around

Left mouse button - use item

tab - open inventory

F - action
